channel.title: Memories on Jim Mitchell
channel.description: Recent content in Memories on Jim Mitchell

item.title: The Day I Sort of Met Martin Mull
item.description: Hearing of the passing of Martin Mull reminded me of the time that I sort of met him quite by accident. What struck me was that he was exactly the same person I’d seen on TV so many times.

item.title: Pour One Out for Henry
item.description: It’s always jarring to learn of someone you knew passing away.

item.title: The Ant Mound
item.description: Though it didn’t turn out to be the end of the world, it sure seemed like a living hell when it happened.

item.title: Memorable Cigarettes
item.description: I used to smoke a long time ago. It’s not something I’m proud of, but it is part of who I am. These are a few memories tied to a nasty habit I was able to break.
